title: Help @~@
body: Okay, so, I am connected to the internet, but the client won't let me log in. I tried everything I could find in the support to try and fix this problem, but nothing is working. Anybody know how to fix? @~@

replies.body: Your network could be having an issue specifically connecting to the authentication server.  You can use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to reconfigure your network to allow access.  As a supplement, the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can also automatically configure firewall settings in case that might have changed.  Let me know if you have any questions!
